name: Lee Kuan Yew
description: First Prime Minister of Singapore who transformed the city-state from a developing nation into one of the world's most prosperous countries
philosophy: I have never been overconcerned or obsessed with opinion polls or popularity polls. I think a leader who is, is a weak leader.
quotes: The task of the leader is to get his people from where they are to where they have not been
Between being loved and being feared, I have always believed Machiavelli was right. If nobody is afraid of me, I'm meaningless
